Maltese: Kull wieħed mis-27 Stat Membru se jkollu stand li turi t-tradizzjonijiet, l-ispeċjalitajiet tal-ikel u l-attrazzjonijiet turistiċi nazzjonali.
English: Each of the 27 Member States will have a stand putting on display national traditions, food specialities and touristic attractions.

Maltese: It-tfal se jkunu l-mistednin speċjali tagħna b'ħafna attivitajiet divertenti, inkluż spettaklu tal-pupazzi.
English: Kids will be our special guests with a lot of fun activities, including a puppet show.

Maltese: B'mod parallel mal-emenda tal-lum, il-Kummissjoni se tniedi wkoll reviżjonitar-Regolament Agrikolu de minimis, fid-dawl tal-pressjoni inflazzjonarja f'dawn l-aħħar snin u l-kuntest attwali fejn, fost l-oħrajn, prezzijiet għoljin tal-komoditajiet qed jaffettwaw is-settur agrikolu.
English: In parallel to today's amendment, the Commission will also launch a revision of the Agricultural de minimis Regulation, in light of the inflationary pressure in recent years and the current context with, amongst others, high commodity prices affecting the agricultural sector.

Maltese: Se jkun hemm attivitajiet speċjali li jenfasizzaw l-20 anniversarju tat-tkabbir tal-UE tal-2004, il-25 sena tal-ewro u t-30 sena tas-Suq Uniku.
English: Special activities will highlight the 20th anniversary of the 2004 EU enlargement, 25 years of the euro and 30 years of the Single Market.

Maltese: Fl-istand tal-Bank Ewropew tal-Investiment għal Jum l-Ewropa fi Brussell fl-4 ta' Mejju u fil-Lussemburgu fid-9 ta' Mejju (ara d-dettalji hawnhekk), il-viżitaturi jistgħu jesploraw il-proġetti ikoniċi ffinanzjati mill-BEI f'pajjiżhom.
English: At the European Investment Bank's stand for Europe Day in Brussels on 4 May and in Luxembourg on 9 May (see details here), visitors can explore the iconic projects financed by the EIB in their country.

Maltese: Biex tissodisfa d-domanda għolja, f'Jannar 2024, il-Kummissjoni ddeċidiet li tittriplika l-baġit inizjali allokat għal EUR 4.5 miljun, issa tiffinanzja 65 proġett, inklużi 324 riċerkatur.
English: To meet the high demand, in January 2024, the Commission decided to triple the initial allocated budget to €4.5 million, now funding 65 projects, including 324 researchers.

Maltese: Fid-9 ta' Mejju, l-Ewropa tfakkar id-dokument fundatur tal-UE — id-Dikjarazzjoni ta' Schuman.
English: On 9 May, Europe commemorates the founding document of the EU – the Schuman Declaration.

Maltese: Se jkun hemm żjarat iggwidati tal-wirja VOTE (Parlamentarium) fi Brussell.
English: There will be guided tours of the VOTE exhibition (Parlamentarium) in Brussels.

Maltese: Dan ir-Regolament jeżenta ammonti żgħar ta' appoġġ fis-settur agrikolu mill-kontroll tal-għajnuna mill-Istat peress li jitqiesu li ma għandhom l-ebda impatt fuq il-kompetizzjoni u l-kummerċ fis-Suq Uniku.
English: This Regulation exempts small amounts of support in the agricultural sector from State aid control since they are deemed to have no impact on competition and trade in the Single Market.

Maltese: 10 % mill-enerġija
English: 10% Energy

Maltese: Taqsima 2.8: Miżuri biex jiġu aċċellerati iktar l-investimenti fis-setturi essenzjali għat-tranżizzjoni lejn ekonomija b'emissjonijiet żero netti, li jippermettu appoġġ għall-investiment għall-manifattura ta' tagħmir strateġiku, jiġifieri batteriji, pannelli solari, turbini eoliċi, pompi tas-sħana, elettrolizzaturi u l-użu tal-qbid tal-karbonju u l-ħżin tiegħu kif ukoll għall-produzzjoni ta' komponenti ewlenin u għall-produzzjoni u r-riċiklaġġ ta' materja prima kritika relatata.
English: Section 2.8: Measures to further accelerate investments in key sectors for the transition towards a net-zero economy, enabling investment support for the manufacturing of strategic equipment, namely batteries, solar panels, wind turbines, heat-pumps, electrolysers and carbon capture usage and storage as well as for production of key components and for production and recycling of related critical raw materials.

Maltese: It-Taqsima 2.5: Miżuri li jaċċelleraw l-introduzzjoni tal-enerġija rinnovabbli.
English: Section 2.5: Measures accelerating the rollout of renewable energy.

Maltese: Fid-9 ta' Marzu 2023 il-Kummissjoni adottat il-Qafas Temporanju ta' Kriżi u ta' Tranżizzjoni kurrenti biex tħeġġeġ miżuri ta' appoġġ f'setturi li huma essenzjali għat-tranżizzjoni lejn ekonomija newtrali għall-klima, f'konformità mal-Pjan Industrijali tal-Patt Ekoloġiku.
English: On 9 March 2023, the Commission adopted the current Temporary Crisis and Transition Framework to foster support measures in sectors which are key for the transition to a net-zero economy, in line with the Green Deal Industrial Plan.

Maltese: Ara l-programm sħiħ hawnhekk u l-avvenimenti organizzati fis-27 pajjiż tal-UE hawnhekk.
English: See the full programme here and the events organised in the 27 EU countries here.

Maltese: Sadanittant, prodotti agrikoli sensittivi tal-UE bħal-laħam taċ-ċanga, il-laħam tan-nagħaġ u l-prodotti tal-ħalib huma protetti bi kwoti tariffarji mfassla bir-reqqa.
English: Meanwhile, sensitive EU agricultural products such as beef, sheepmeat and dairy products are protected with carefully designed tariff rate quotas.

Maltese: Fl-4 ta' Mejju, il-viżitaturi tal-Kunsill fi Brussell se jkollhom l-opportunità jimxu fuq il-passi tal-mexxejja tal-UE.
English: On 4 May, at the Council in Brussels, visitors will have the opportunity to walk in the footsteps of EU leaders.

Maltese: L-assemblea tar-reġjuni u l-bliet tal-UE se tiftaħ il-bini tagħha fi Brussell fl-4 ta' Mejju biex tlaqqa' liċ-ċittadini flimkien mal-politiċi eletti reġjonali u lokali.
English: The EU's assembly of regions and cities will open its Brussels premises on 4 May to bring citizens together with regional and local elected politicians.

Maltese: Inizjalment, il-proġett Eurizon antiċipa li jirċievi massimu ta' 70 applikazzjoni u kien mistenni li jappoġġa madwar 22 tim, li jammontaw għal madwar 90 riċerkatur, b'baġit ta' EUR 1.5 miljun.
English: Initially, the EURIZON project anticipated receiving a maximum of 70 applications and expected to support around 22 teams, totalling approximately 90 researchers, with a budget of €1.5 million.

Maltese: Il-familji u l-persuni ta' kull età se jkunu jistgħu jitgħallmu kif il-QEA qed tgħin fil-protezzjoni tal-flus taċ-ċittadini tal-UE.
English: Families and people of all ages will be able to learn how the ECA helps to protect EU citizens' money.

Maltese: Biex ikomplu jaċċelleraw id-diversifikazzjoni tal-provvisti tal-enerġija, l-Istati Membri jistgħu jappoġġaw investimenti għat-tneħħija gradwali tal-fjuwils fossili, b'mod partikolari permezz tal-elettrifikazzjoni, l-effiċjenza enerġetika u l-qlib lejn l-użu tal-idroġenu rinnovabbli u mill-elettriku li jikkonforma ma' ċerti kundizzjonijiet, b'possibbiltajiet estiżi biex tiġi appoġġata d-dekarbonizzazzjoni tal-proċessi industrijali li jaqilbu għal fjuwils derivati mill-idroġenu.
English: To further accelerate the diversification of energy supplies, Member States can support investments to phase-out from fossil fuels, in particular through electrification, energy efficiency and the switch to the use of renewable and electricity-based hydrogen which complies with certain conditions, with expanded possibilities to support the decarbonisation of industrial processes switching to hydrogen-derived fuels.

Maltese: It-Taqsima 2.1: Ammonti limitati ta' għajnuna, fi kwalunkwe forma sa EUR 280,000 għal kull kumpanija attiva fis-settur agrikolu primarju, u EUR 335,000 għal kumpaniji attivi fis-sajd jew l-akkwakultura sal-31 ta' Diċembru 2024, u sa EUR 2.25 miljun fis-setturi l-oħra kollha sat-30 ta' Ġunju 2024;
English: Section 2.1: Limited amounts of aid, in any form up to €280,000 per company active in the primary agriculture sector, and €335,000 for companies active in fisheries or aquaculture until 31 December 2024, and up to €2.25 million in all other sectors until 30 June 2024;

Maltese: It-Taqsima 2.1, li tippermetti lill-Istati Membri jagħtu ammonti limitati ta' għajnuna, se tiġi eliminata gradwalment sat-30 ta' Ġunju 2024 għas-setturi kollha għajr il-produzzjoni primarja agrikola, is-sajd u l-akkwakultura;
English: Section 2.1, allowing Member States to grant limited amounts of aid, will phase-out by 30 June 2024 for all sectors other than agricultural primary production, fisheries and aquaculture;

Maltese: L-avveniment ta' Jum l-Ewropa fil-Parlament Ewropew fl-4 ta' Mejju se jibda b'ċerimonja tal-ftuħ mal-Viċi President Marc Angel (S&D, LU).
English: The Europe Day event in the European Parliament on 4 May will start with an opening ceremony with Vice-President Marc Angel (S&D, LU).

Maltese: Il-programm sħiħ hu disponibbli hawnhekk.
English: The full programme is available here.

Maltese: 15 % ambjent
English: 15% Environment

Maltese: Il-programm sħiħ jinsab hawnhekk.
English: Full programme here.

Maltese: Barra minn hekk, l-UE impenjat ruħha li tipprovdi assistenza speċifika u prattika oħra lill-komunità tar-riċerka u l-innovazzjoni tal-Ukrajna.
English: Furthermore, the EU has committed to providing other specific, practical assistance to the Ukrainian research and innovation community.

Maltese: Il-programm sħiħ jinsab hawnhekk.
English: Full programme here.

Maltese: It-Taqsima 2.4: Għajnuna biex tagħti kumpens għall-prezzijiet għoljin tal-enerġija.
English: Section 2.4: Aid to compensate for high energy prices.

Maltese: Il-Qafas Temporanju ta' Għajnuna mill-Istat għall-Kriżijiet, li ġie adottat fit-23 ta' Marzu 2022, ippermetta li l-Istati Membri jużaw il-flessibbiltà prevista skont ir-regoli dwar l-għajnuna mill-Istat biex jappoġġaw l-ekonomija fil-kuntest tal-gwerra tar-Russja kontra l-Ukrajna.
English: The State aid Temporary Crisis Framework, adopted on 23 March 2022, enabled Member States to use the flexibility foreseen under State aid rules to support the economy in the context of Russia's war against Ukraine.

Maltese: Xahar qabel l-elezzjonijiet Ewropej (mis-6 sad-9 ta' Ġunju), iċ-ċittadini se jkollhom l-opportunità li jżuru l-istituzzjonijiet tal-UE fi Brussell u lil hinn minnha, u jitgħallmu aktar dwar dak li l-Ewropa tagħmel għalihom u magħhom.
English: A month ahead of the European elections (from 6 to 9 June), citizens will have the opportunity to visit the EU institutions in Brussels and beyond, learning more about what Europe does for and with them.

Maltese: suq tas-servizzi ta' New Zealand aktar miftuħ f'setturi ewlenin bħas-servizzi finanzjarji, it-telekomunikazzjonijiet, it-trasport marittimu u s-servizzi ta' konsenja;
English: A more open New Zealand services market in key sectors such as financial services, telecommunications, maritime transport and delivery services.

Maltese: It-tweġiba qabżet l-aspettattivi, b' total ta' 786 applikazzjoni riċevuti, li minnhom 730 kienu eliġibbli.
English: The response exceeded expectations, with a total of 786 applications received, of which 730 were eligible.

Maltese: Kuntest ġenerali
English: Background

Maltese: Taħt tali miżuri, l-għajnuna tista' tingħata sal-31 ta' Diċembru 2025.
English: Under such measures, aid may be granted until 31 December 2025.

Maltese: Il-Kummissjoni tadotta estensjoni limitata tal-għodod ta' kriżi tal-għajnuna mill-Istat biex tkompli tappoġġa s-setturi tal-agrikoltura u tas-sajd
English: Commission adopts limited prolongation of State aid crisis tools to further support agriculture and fisheries sectors

Maltese: B'mod aktar speċifiku, l-Istati Membri jistgħu jagħtu appoġġ lis-settur agrikolu sa EUR 20,000 għal kull benefiċjarju (EUR 25,000, jekk l-Istat Membru jkollu reġistru ċentrali biex jirreġistra l-għajnuna de minimis) fuq perjodu ta' 3 snin mingħajr notifika minn qabel lill-Kummissjoni għall-approvazzjoni.
English: More specifically, Member States can grant support to the agricultural sector of up to €20,000 per beneficiary (€25,000, if the Member State has a central register to register de minimis aid) over a period of 3 years without prior notification to the Commission for approval.

Maltese: Taħt skemi bħal dawn, l-għajnuna tista' tingħata sal-31 ta' Diċembru 2025; wara dik id-data, ir-regoli tas-soltu dwar l-għajnuna mill-Istat se jkomplu japplikaw, inklużi b'mod partikolari d-dispożizzjonijiet korrispondenti tal-Linji Gwida dwar l-Għajnuna għall-Klima, l-Enerġija u l-Ambjent (CEEAG);
English: Under such schemes, aid may be granted until 31 December 2025; after that date, the usual State aid rules will continue to apply, including in particular the corresponding provisions of the Climate, Energy and Environmental Aid Guidelines (CEEAG);

Maltese: F'termini tad-dimensjoni tal-ġeneru, 88 % tat-timijiet kienu jinkludu n-nisa.
English: In terms of gender dimension, 88% of the teams included women.

Maltese: It-taqsimiet 2.5, 2.6 u 2.8 li għandhom l-għan li jaċċelleraw it-tranżizzjoni ekoloġika u jnaqqsu d-dipendenzi fuq il-fjuwils se jibqgħu disponibbli sal-31 ta' Diċembru 2025.
English: Sections 2.5, 2.6 and 2.8 aimed at accelerating the green transition and reducing fuel dependencies will remain available until 31 December 2025.

Maltese: Bis-saħħa ta' dan il-ftehim, il-kummerċ bejn l-UE u New Zealand mistenni jiżdied b'massimu ta' 30 % fi żmien għaxar snin, bl-esportazzjonijiet tal-UE potenzjalment jiżdiedu b'massimu ta' €4.5 biljun fis-sena.
English: Thanks to this deal, EU-New Zealand trade is expected to grow by up to 30% within a decade, with EU exports potentially growing by up to €4.5 billion annually.

Maltese: Il-programm ta' Boroż ta' Studju jiffinanzja proġetti ta' riċerka mwettqa f'kollaborazzjoni mal-Infrastrutturi Ewropej tar-Riċerka.
English: The Fellowship Programme funds research projects conducted in collaboration with European Research Infrastructures.

Maltese: L-Istati Membri jistgħu jistabbilixxu skemi għall-investimenti fis-sorsi kollha tal-enerġija rinnovabbli, inkluż fl-idroġenu rinnovabbli, fil-bijogass u fil-bijometan, fil-ħżin, u fis-sħana rinnovabbli, inkluż permezz ta' pompi tas-sħana, bi proċedura ta' sejħa għall-offerti simplifikata li tista' tiġi implimentata malajr, filwaqt li tinkludi biżżejjed salvagwardji biex jitħarsu l-kundizzjonijiet ekwivalenti.
English: Member States can set up schemes for investments in all renewable energy sources, including renewable hydrogen, biogas and biomethane, storage and renewable heat, including through heat pumps, with simplified tender procedures that can be quickly implemented, while including sufficient safeguards to protect the level playing field.

Maltese: L-applikazzjonijiet eliġibbli koprew diversi oqsma tematiċi, bħal:
English: The eligible applications covered various thematic fields, such as:

Maltese: Dan il-ftehim storiku jinkludi wkoll impenji ta' sostenibbiltà bla preċedenti, inkluż ir-rispett tal-Ftehim ta' Pariġi dwar il-Klima u d-drittijiet ewlenin tal-ħaddiema.
English: This landmark agreement also includes unprecedented sustainability commitments, including respect of the Paris Climate Agreement and core labour rights.

Maltese: Iffirmata fid-9 ta' Mejju 1950, id-dikjarazzjoni kienet pass ewlieni lejn il-kooperazzjoni fl-Ewropa, u l-paċi fil-kontinent tagħna.
English: Signed on 9 May 1950, the declaration was the stepping-stone to cooperation in Europe, and peace on our continent.

Maltese: L-edizzjoni ta' Jum l-Ewropa ta' din is-sena se ssir 45 sena wara l-ewwel elezzjonijiet Ewropej fl-1979, u ftit qabel l-elezzjonijiet tal-2024 li se jsiru bejn is-6 u d-9 ta' Ġunju fil-pajjiżi kollha tal-UE.
English: This year's Europe Day edition takes place 45 years after the first European elections in 1979, and shortly before the elections of 2024 that will take place between 6-9 June in all EU countries.

Maltese: Illum, il-Kummissjoni Ewropea adottat emenda għall-Qafas Temporanju ta' Għajnuna mill-Istat ta' Kriżi u ta' Tranżizzjoni (State aid Temporary Crisis and Transition Framework, TCTF) biex testendi b'sitt xhur ċerti dispożizzjonijiet tal-Qafas li għandhom l-għan li jindirizzaw id-disturbi persistenti fis-suq speċifikament fis-setturi tal-agrikoltura u tas-sajd.
English: Today, the European Commission has adopted an amendment to the State aid Temporary Crisis and Transition Framework (TCTF) to prolong by six months certain provisions of the Framework aimed to address persisting market disturbances specifically in the agriculture and fisheries sectors.

Maltese: Minkejja dawn l-isfidi, ix-xjenzati Ukreni għadhom impenjati għall-ħidma tagħhom.
English: Despite these challenges, Ukrainian scientists remain committed to their work.

Maltese: Se jkun hemm wirja ddedikata għall-20 anniversarju tat-tkabbir tal-UE tal-2004.
English: An exhibition will be dedicated to the 20th anniversary of the 2004 EU enlargement.

Maltese: Se jieħdu sehem f'taħditiet mal-ambaxxaturi għall-UE u jitgħallmu dwar ir-rwol tal-UE fil-promozzjoni tal-paċi, id-drittijiet tal-bniedem u l-iżvilupp sostenibbli fid-dinja.
English: They will engage in talks with EU ambassadors and learn about the EU's role in promoting peace, human rights and sustainable development in the world.

Maltese: Barra minn hekk, il-ftehim jipproteġi l-lista sħiħa tal-inbejjed u l-ispirti tal-UE (kważi 2,000 isem), bħal Prosecco u Champagne, kif ukoll 163 mill-aktar prodotti tradizzjonali magħrufin tal-UE (Indikazzjonijiet Ġeografiċi), bħall-ġobon Feta, il-perżut Istarski pršut u l-Lübecker Marzipan.
English: Moreover, the agreement protects the full list of EU wines and spirits (close to 2,000 names), such as Prosecco and Champagne, as well as 163 of the most renowned traditional EU products (Geographical Indications), such as Feta cheese, Istarski pršut ham and Lübecker Marzipan.

Maltese: Il-programm tal-ġurnata jinkludi logħob interattiv, kwiżż tal-UE, mużika live u attivitajiet għat-tfal.
English: The programme of the day includes interactive games, an EU quiz, live music and activities for children.

Maltese: Aktar informazzjoni dwar il-Qafas Temporanju ta' Kriżi u Tranżizzjoni u azzjonijiet oħra meħuda mill-Kummissjoni biex tindirizza l-impatt ekonomiku tal-gwerra tar-Russja kontra l-Ukrajna u trawwem it-tranżizzjoni lejn ekonomija b'emissjonijiet żero netti tista' tinstab hawnhekk.
English: More information on the Temporary Crisis and Transition Framework and other actions taken by the Commission to address the economic impact of Russia's war against Ukraine and foster the transition towards a net-zero economy can be found here.

Maltese: Il-Kumitat Ekonomiku u Soċjali Ewropew
English: European Economic and Social Committee

Maltese: Taħt skemi bħal dawn, l-għajnuna tista' tingħata sal-31 ta' Diċembru 2025; wara dik id-data, ir-regoli tas-soltu dwar l-għajnuna mill-Istat se jkomplu japplikaw, inklużi b'mod partikolari d-dispożizzjonijiet korrispondenti tas-CEEAG;
English: Under such schemes, aid may be granted until 31 December 2025; after that date, the usual State aid rules will continue to apply, including in particular the corresponding provisions of the CEEAG;

Maltese: Fil-11 ta' April 2024, il-Kummissjoni kkonsultat lill-Istati Membri dwar il-persistenza ta' tfixkil serju tal-ekonomija li jaffettwa b'mod partikolari s-setturi primarji tal-agrikoltura, tas-sajd u tal-akkwakultura.
English: On 11 April 2024, the Commission consulted Member States on the persistence of a serious disturbance of the economy affecting in particular the primary agricultural, fisheries and aquaculture sectors.

Maltese: Fl-4 ta' Mejju, iċ-ċittadini se jkunu jistgħu jiltaqgħu mal-esperti tal-BĊE fil-Kummissjoni Ewropea fi Brussell (aktar informazzjoni tinsab hawnhekk).
English: On 4 May, citizens will be able to meet ECB experts at the European Commission in Brussels (more information here).

Maltese: Se jkun hemm taqsima ddedikata li turi l-appoġġ tagħna lill-Ukrajna.
English: A dedicated section will showcase our support to Ukraine.

Maltese: 14 % saħħa u Ikel
English: 14% Health and Food

Maltese: Id-dar tas-soċjetà ċivili organizzata tal-UE se tiftaħ il-bibien tagħha fi Brussell fl-4 ta' Mejju.
English: The house of EU organised civil society will open its doors in Brussels on 4 May.

Maltese: kapitolu ddedikat biex jgħin l-esportazzjonijiet tan-negozji ż-żgħar;
English: A dedicated chapter to help small business exports.

Maltese: Ir-Rappreżentanzi fl-Istati Membri se jorganizzaw avvenimenti wkoll.
English: The Representations in the Member States will also organise events.

Maltese: F'Jum l-Ewropa, fid-9 ta' Mejju, l-UE tiċċelebra l-kisbiet tagħha ta' għaqda u paċi fit-tul, filwaqt li tfakkar l-iffirmar tad-Dikjarazzjoni ta' Schuman fl-1950.
English: On Europe Day, 9 May, the EU celebrates its achievements of unity and long-term peace, commemorating the signing of the Schuman Declaration in 1950.

Maltese: Il-proġetti se jwettqu r-riċerka tagħhom fl-oqsma xjentifiċi kollha u se jitwettqu f'kollaborazzjoni mal-Infrastrutturi Ewropej tar-Riċerka.
English: The projects will carry out their research in all scientific domains and will be conducted in collaboration with European Research Infrastructures.

Maltese: Sfond
English: Background

Maltese: Se jgawdu mużika live, spettakli taż-żfin u workshops u jieħdu lura magħhom ispirazzjonijiet kulinarji minn diversi postijiet madwar id-dinja.
English: They will enjoy live music, dance performances, workshops and collect culinary inspirations from various places around the world.

Maltese: Minħabba l-gwerra ta' aggressjoni tar-Russja li għaddejja bħalissa, l-Ukrajna qed tiffaċċja ħsara dejjem akbar għall-infrastruttura tar-riċerka, sfidi loġistiċi u finanzjarji fis-sostenn tal-attivitajiet ta' riċerka fil-pajjiż, u telf inkwetanti ta' professjonisti tas-sengħa.
English: Due to Russia's ongoing war of aggression, Ukraine is confronted with escalating damage to research infrastructure, logistical and financial challenges in sustaining research activities within the country, and a concerning loss of skilled professionals.

Maltese: Iċ-ċittadini se jiġu mistiedna jinfurmaw ruħhom kif issir il-votazzjoni fl-elezzjonijiet Ewropej, għaliex huwa importanti li wieħed jivvota, u kif jistgħu jagħmlu differenza fil-protezzjoni tad-demokrazija.
English: Citizens will be invited to learn how to vote in the European elections, why voting matters, and how to make a difference in protecting democracy.

Maltese: Se jiġu organizzati żjarat iggwidati matul il-jum, mingħajr reġistrazzjoni minn qabel, li jippermettu liċ-ċittadini jesploraw ukoll l-arkitettura tal-binjiet tal-Kunsill.
English: Guided tours will be organised throughout the day, without prior registration, allowing citizens to explore also the architecture of the Council buildings.

Maltese: Il-viżitaturi se jkollhom l-opportunità jiskopru x'qed tagħmel il-Kummissjoni biex tiddefendi d-demokrazija u d-diversità tagħna u kif qed nibnu futur aktar diġitali u aktar ekoloġiku.
English: Visitors will have the chance to find out what the Commission does to defend our democracy, diversity and how we are building a more digital and greener future.

Maltese: Jum l-Ewropa 2024: L-istituzzjonijiet Ewropej tal-Ewropa kollha jilqgħu liċ-ċittadini għall-avvenimenti tagħhom marbutin mal-Jum għall-Pubbliku
English: Europe Day 2024: European institutions across Europe welcome citizens to their Open Day events

Maltese: L-għajnuna, li tista' tingħata fi kwalunkwe forma sat-30 ta' Ġunju 2024, se tikkumpensa parzjalment lill-kumpaniji, b'mod partikolari lil dawk li huma utenti intensivi tal-enerġija, għal kostijiet addizzjonali minħabba żidiet eċċezzjonali fil-prezzijiet tal-gass u tal-elettriku;
English: The aid, which can be granted in any form until 30 June 2024, will partially compensate companies, in particular intensive energy users, for additional costs due to exceptional gas and electricity price increases;

Maltese: Il-qafas Temporanju għall-Kriżijiet ġie emendat fl-20 ta' Lulju 2022 u fit-28 ta' Ottubru 2022.
English: The Temporary Crisis Framework was amended on 20 July 2022 and on 28 October 2022.

Maltese: In-negozji tal-UE issa jistgħu jieħdu vantaġġ mill-benefiċċji bħal:
English: EU business can now take advantage of benefits such as:

Maltese: Wara l-emenda tal-lum, it-TCTF jippermetti:
English: Following today's amendment, the TCTF allows:

Maltese: Il-ftehim huwa mistenni jnaqqas €140 miljun fis-sena f'dazji għall-kumpaniji tal-UE.
English: The deal is expected to cut €140 million a year in duties for EU companies.

Maltese: rekwiżiti u proċeduri ta' konformità mnaqqsa b'mod sinifikanti.
English: Significantly reduced compliance requirements and procedures.

Maltese: Jum l-Ewropa huwa simbolu tal-ftuħ, it-trasparenza, id-demokrazija u l-unità tal-UE.
English: Europe Day is a symbol of the EU's openness, transparency, democracy, and unity.

Maltese: Il-Kummissjoni ħadet nota wkoll tal-konklużjonijiet tal-Kunsill Ewropew tas-17 u t-18 ta' April 2024 dwar l-importanza ta' settur agrikolu reżiljenti u sostenibbli għas-sigurtà tal-ikel u l-awtonomija strateġika tal-UE, u l-inkoraġġiment tiegħu biex tkompli l-ħidma fuq estensjoni possibbli tat-TCTF.
English: The Commission has also taken note of the European Council's conclusions of 17 and 18 April 2024 on the importance of a resilient and sustainable agricultural sector for food security and the EU's strategic autonomy, and its encouragement to pursue the work on a possible extension of the TCTF.

Maltese: Il-Bank Ċentrali Ewropew
English: European Central Bank

Maltese: Fl-4 ta' Mejju, il-viżitaturi tas-Servizz Ewropew għall-Azzjoni Esterna huma mistiedna jesperjenzaw il-ħidma dinamika tas-servizz diplomatiku tal-UE fi Brussell u madwar id-dinja.
English: Visitors to the European External Action Service are invited on 4 May to immerse themselves in the dynamic work of the EU diplomatic service in Brussels and around the world.

Maltese: Informazzjoni prattika biex tgħin lill-esportaturi tal-UE jieħdu vantaġġ minn dawn l-opportunitajiet ġodda tinsab fuq il-paġna tal-Kummissjoni Access2Markets.
English: Practical information to help EU exporters take advantage of these new opportunities can be found on the Commission's Access2Markets page.

Maltese: Ir-riċerkaturi żgħażagħ kienu rrappreżentati tajjeb fost l-applikanti.
English: Young researchers were well represented among the applicants.

Maltese: Informazzjoni ġenerali
English: Background

Maltese: aċċess imtejjeb għall-kumpaniji tal-UE għall-kuntratti ta' akkwist pubbliku mill-gvern ta' New Zealand għall-merkanzija, is-servizzi, ix-xogħlijiet u l-konċessjoni ta' xogħlijiet;
English: Improved access for EU companies to New Zealand government procurement contracts for goods, services, works and works concessions.

Maltese: Il-jum se jkompli b'attivitajiet għall-etajiet kollha, bi stands ta' informazzjoni u sessjonijiet qosra dwar il-ġlieda kontra d-diżinformazzjoni, dwar in-nisa fil-politika u dwar il-kampanji għall-elezzjonijiet.
English: The day will continue with activities for all ages, with info stands and short sessions on fight against disinformation, women in politics and campaigning for the elections.

Maltese: Aktar informazzjoni dwar il-possibbiltajiet ta' appoġġ għal miżuri biex titħaffef it-tranżizzjoni lejn ekonomija b'emissjonijiet żero netti tista' tinstab hawnhekk.
English: More information on the support possibilities for measures to accelerate the transition to a net-zero economy can be found here.

Maltese: Biex jitfakkar il-jum, u t-30 anniversarju tal-Kumitat, se jkun hemm festival tar-reġjuni u tal-bliet b'sessjonijiet ta' dewqan, logħob tal-kwiżż u wirja diġitali, li jipprovdu opportunità biex niċċelebraw id-diversità tat-territorji tagħna.
English: To mark the day – and the Committee's 30th anniversary – there will be a festival of regions and cities with tastings, quiz games and a digital show, providing an opportunity to celebrate the diversity of our territories.

Maltese: Iċ-ċittadini se jkollhom l-opportunità jsiru jafu iktar dwar l-ewro, il-munita komuni ta' 20 pajjiż tal-UE, il-proġett tal-ewro diġitali u dwar dak li qed jagħmel il-BĊE biex iżomm il-prezzijiet stabbli u l-banek sikuri u sodi.
English: Citizens will have the chance to learn about the euro, the common currency of 20 EU countries, the digital euro project and what the ECB does to keep prices stable and banks safe and sound.

Maltese: Il-membri tal-KESE se jieħdu sehem f'diskussjonijiet vivaċi man-nies u se jisimgħu t-tħassib tagħhom.
English: The EESC members will engage in lively discussions with people and will hear their concerns.

Maltese: Il-Kummissjoni Ewropea
English: European Commission

Maltese: Jidħol fis-seħħ ftehim kummerċjali bejn l-UE u New Zealand, li jiftaħ opportunitajiet ġodda għall-esportaturi tal-UE
English: EU-New Zealand trade agreement enters into force, opening new opportunities for EU exporters.

Maltese: Il-Kunsill tal-Unjoni Ewropea
English: Council of the European Union

Maltese: In-negozji, il-produtturi u l-bdiewa tal-UE issa jistgħu jieħdu vantaġġ minn għadd ta' opportunitajiet ġodda ta' esportazzjoni bid-dħul fis-seħħ illum tal-ftehim kummerċjali bejn l-UE u New Zealand.
English: EU businesses, producers and farmers are now able to take advantage of a host of new export opportunities with the entry into force of the EU-New Zealand trade agreement today.

Maltese: It-theddida kostanti ta' attakki fuq infrastruttura kritika, kif ukoll l-impossibbiltà tal-ivvjaġġar u t-tnaqqis tal-finanzjament mill-Istat xekklu l-progress fir-riċerka.
English: The constant threat of attacks on critical infrastructure, as well as the impossibility of travelling and the reduction of state funding has hindered research progress.

Maltese: Is-Servizz Ewropew għall-Azzjoni Esterna
English: European External Action Service

Maltese: Is-sejħa għalqet f'Mejju 2023, wara kampanja estensiva ta' tixrid fl-Ukrajna.
English: The call closed in May 2023, following an extensive dissemination campaign in Ukraine.

Maltese: Fl-4 ta' Mejju, iċ-ċittadini huma mistiedna jżuru l-bini tal-Berlaymont.
English: On 4 May, citizens are invited to visit the Berlaymont building.

Maltese: 15 % innovazzjoni Soċjali u Kulturali
English: 15% Social and Cultural Innovation

Maltese: Il-vjaġġ immersiv se jkompli jiġi arrikkit b'wiri ta' films diversi fil-kamra taċ-ċinema.
English: The immersive journey will be further enriched with screenings of diverse movies in the cinema room.

Maltese: Wieħed mill-istadji importanti huwa t-tnedija tal-uffiċċju ta' Orizzont Ewropa fi Kiev.
English: One of the milestones is the launch of the Horizon Europe office in Kyiv.

Maltese: Wara li l-Parlament Ewropew adottah fit-22 ta' Novembru 2023, fis-27 ta' Novembru 2023, il-Kunsill adotta deċiżjoni biex jiġi konkluż il-ftehim.
English: The European Parliament adopted it on 22 November 2023, followed by the adoption of a decision to conclude the agreement by the Council on 27 November 2023.

Maltese: L-estensjoni ma tinkludix żieda tal-limiti massimi stabbiliti għall-ammonti limitati ta' għajnuna.
English: The prolongation does not include an increase of the ceilings set out for the limited amounts of aid.

Maltese: Il-Kummissjoni se tagħti liċ-ċittadini l-opportunità li jinfurmaw ruħhom dwar ir-rwol tagħha, jesploraw il-villaġġi tematiċi armati għall-okkażjoni u jiskopru l-istorja tal-UE u l-valuri tagħna.
English: The Commission will give citizens the opportunity to learn about its role, explore thematic villages set up for the occasion and discover the history of the EU and our values.

Maltese: L-emenda tal-lum ma taffettwax id-dispożizzjonijiet li fadal tat-TCTF:
English: Today's amendment does not affect the remaining provisions of the TCTF:

Maltese: Il-programm ta' Boroż ta' Studju Eurizon huwa mistenni li jkollu impatti pożittivi sinifikanti fuq il-ħidma tar-riċerkaturi Ukreni, inkluża l-opportunità li jerġgħu jibdew il-proġetti tagħhom, iwettqu riċerka mill-aktar avvanzata, jistabbilixxu kuntatt stabbli mas-sħab internazzjonali, u jwessgħu t-tixrid tar-riċerka.
English: The EURIZON Fellowship Programme is expected to have significant positive impacts on the work of Ukrainian researchers, including the opportunity to restart their projects, conduct cutting-edge research, establish stable contact with international partners, and broaden research dissemination.

Maltese: Taqsima 2.6: Miżuri li jiffaċilitaw id-dekarbonizzazzjoni tal-proċessi industrijali.
English: Section 2.6: Measures facilitating the decarbonisation of industrial processes.

Maltese: Il-programm ta' Boroż ta' Studju se jippermettilhom ukoll inaqqsu l-istress, jgħinu jsolvu d-diffikultajiet tal-familja, jaċċessaw libreriji universitarji barranin, iżommu speċjalisti tal-IT, u jidentifikaw xejriet u l-aħjar prattiki fil-ġestjoni pubblika.
English: The Fellowship Programme will also allow them to reduce stress, help solve family difficulties, access foreign university libraries, retain IT specialists, and identify trends and best practices in public management.

Maltese: Il-bdiewa tal-UE se jibbenefikaw mill-eliminazzjoni tat-tariffi fuq esportazzjonijiet ewlenin tal-UE bħal-laħam tal-majjal, l-inbid u l-inbid frizzanti, iċ-ċikkulata, il-ħlewwiet taz-zokkor u l-gallettini.
English: EU farmers will benefit from the elimination of tariffs on key EU exports such as pig meat, wine and sparkling wine, chocolate, sugar confectionary and biscuits.

Maltese: L-applikazzjonijiet ġew mill-Ukrajna kollha, b'maġġoranza minn Kiev, segwiti minn Kharkiv u Lviv.
English: Applications came from all over Ukraine, with a majority from Kyiv, followed by Kharkiv and Lviv.

Maltese: Din id-deċiżjoni li tiġi posposta t-tneħħija gradwali tat-TCTF tippermetti lill-Istati Membri jipprovdu ammonti limitati ta' għajnuna lill-kumpaniji attivi f'dawn is-setturi għal sitt xhur oħra, sal-31 ta' Diċembru 2024.
English: This decision to delay the phase-out of the TCTF allows Member States to provide limited amounts of aid to companies active in these sectors for further six months, until 31 December 2024.

Maltese: Sfond
English: Background

Maltese: Viżitaturi iżgħar se jgawdu minn sensiela ta' animazzjonijiet iddedikati, inkluża kaċċa għat-teżor.
English: Younger visitors will enjoy a series of dedicated animations including a treasure hunt.

Maltese: Barra minn hekk, filgħaxija l-BĊE se jiftaħ il-bibien tiegħu fi Frankfurt għal viżitaturi rreġistrati minn qabel bħala parti mill-inizjattiva “Night of the Museums” u fid-9 ta' Mejju se jingħaqad mal-Festival tal-Ewropa ta' Frankfurt.
English: Also, that evening the ECB will open its doors in Frankfurt to pre-registered visitors as part of the “Night of the Museums” initiative and on 9 May will join Frankfurt's Europe Festival.

Maltese: Il-viżitaturi se jkunu jistgħu jiskopruhom b'mod interattiv u jattendu spettakli live.
English: Visitors will be able to discover these in an interactive manner and attend live performances.

Maltese: Se jkun hemm stands u attivitajiet interattivi li joffru l-opportunità li wieħed isir jaf aktar dwar ir-rwol u l-impenn tal-Kumitat tar-Reġjuni li titnaqqas id-distanza bejn l-UE u l-komunitajiet lokali tagħha.
English: Interactive stands and activities will offer the chance to get to know more about the Committee of the Regions' role and commitment to narrowing the distance between the EU and its local communities.

Maltese: L-għan kien li jiġu offruti fellowships għal żmien qasir li jdumu 6 xhur jew 12-il xahar lir-riċerkaturi vulnerabbli.
English: The goal was to offer short-term fellowships lasting 6 or 12 months to vulnerable researchers.

Maltese: 6 % tal-Infrastrutturi tad-Data, tal-Kompjuter u tar-Riċerka Diġitali
English: 6% Data, Computing and Digital Research Infrastructures

Maltese: Il-ftehim ġie ffirmat miż-żewġ partijiet fid-9 ta' Lulju 2023.
English: The agreement was signed by both parties on 9 July 2023.
